title: (43530) Alcanar - 30 Carrer de l'Onze de Setembre
title_short: (43530) Alcanar - 30 Carrer de l'Onze de Setembre
description: parking

title: (43530) Alcanar - 28 Partida el Camaril
description: Small parking lot on a cliff with a fantastic view just above the water and direct access to a pebble beach for swimming! (There is definitely enough space for 1-2 larger mobile homes!) The beach is officially declared a dog beach, but only before 11:00 and after 18:00 in the high season. Accordingly, it is well attended by many furry friends and their owners, especially in the evenings. But the crowd thins out very quickly as the sun approaches. We spent a quiet night here in the camper (with the roof up) without any problems and started the day with a brilliant sunrise. In the morning the garbage truck comes and quite a lot of very friendly people walk by. Please to everyone: Since there is a whole island of rubbish in the parking lot, please be so kind and use it!

title: (43530) Alcanar - 28 Partida el Camaril
description:
Feet in the water... Spot close to another proposed which seemed to us to be a little less annoying for passers-by and surrounding homes. We spent a very good, quiet night there, with the sound of the waves as our companion.
A few passages of runners/walkers in the morning but our presence did not cause any problems. The police also came twice, in the evening and then the next morning, but did not arrest us.
Accessible to any vehicle!
About 2km from bar/restaurants. A bike path along the beach.

title: (43530) Alcanar - 55 Partida las Mallad
description: Ample parking for AC and Campers near a small cove. We have been during the day overlooking the sea. From the parking you can access the cove.

title: (43530) Alcanar - 5 Partida el Camaril
description: [Cat] Parking in the verges of the aiguamolls de sòl de riu. Very close to sand beaches. Low occupation. No services [En] Parking on the virgin beaches of the Riu soil wetlands. low occupancy.no services

name: Camping & Bungalows Estanyet
title: (43569) Camping & Bungalows Estanyet
description: Alcanar, 2 Partida el Camaril. Estanyet. Nice camping even if old. Private beach. All services on site and even a good restaurant. Beautiful setting and departure of bike paths parcelas muy great con agua y luz. WiFi gratis'

title: (43530) Alcanar - 28 Partida el Camaril
description: Very nice quiet place at the exit of the village. We spent the night along the beach with very little car traffic or even no car at night. Pebble beach is clean.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 6 Carrer Devesa D
description: Secure private area on the North Coast, in a quiet residential area, 50 meters from the beach. Water, electricity and emptying of sewage. Vinaros center 4 kms. Supermarket 2 km. Reservation requested. Area only for motorhomes (not caravans)

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 257 Avinguda de Francisco José Balada
title_short: (12500) Vinaròs - 257 Avinguda de Francisco José Balada
description: Parking at the foot of the cliff, beautiful place with stairs that go down to a small dog-friendly beach, we spend the day here and even pass the local police without telling us anything

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 1D Carrer Cales E
description: Parking day and night on clay. No service. Super quiet night, no car. 100m from the sea. Houses nearby. Very calm. Except by the moment dogs barking. Tic tac bar nearby. Possibility several camper.

title: (43569) Les Cases d'Alcanar - 12 Carrer Hort Adell
title_short: (43569) Les Cases d'Alcanar - 12 Carrer Hort Adell
description: Parking in the center of the village and 100m from the port. No service available but convenient for visiting the resort. At night, RV parking is prohibited along the entire beach. Accessible for large motorhomes, shops nearby

title: (43569) Les Cases d'Alcanar - 4 Carrer Cadis
description: Ground parking. Great location. To see if he leaves it accessible in the future

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 299 Carrer Costa Mar
description: Very small parking space that can accommodate 2 campers (i have a 7m and i get there by brush) or 4/5 cars. Just opposite is a beautiful cove, and you can swim in 2 or 3 beautiful bays. In addition to the rocks, there is a pebble beach with a shower. About 1 km further north is a larger car park, but at the entrance there is a sign that says it's forbidden for campers. Even if tonight, as i passed by, i saw that someone had started anyway. I also saw the police pass several times in the night and i personally preferred to avoid and i parked on the smaller parking lot. Have a nice trip :)

title: (43569) Alcanar - 19 Carrer Barcelona
description: Small free parking. If it is in flat ground. Almost opposite the marina and the center of this pretty village. Restaurants and shops nearby. Few places but possibility of parking 1 or 2 large CC.

title: (43569) Alcanar - 23D Carrer Barcelona
description: Parking adjacent to a residential area at the edge of a playground. Very close to the waterfront. Good for a night in May.

name: Camping Cases
title: (43569) Camping Cases
description: Camping Cases. Simple but very nice campsite. Well priced (6.5 person and 8 AC) and on the beach. Lots of shade. Recommendable!

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 259 Carrer Costa Mar
description: Beautiful quiet parking area hidden right next to the beach place for a good few vans any size ! There are villas and apartments looking to beach so please respect the locals !  Enjoy

title: (43569) Alcanar - 28 Carrer de la Punta
description: Quiet place right on the water. With a small bay with a pebble beach for swimming. Walkers pass by during the day.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 213 Carrer Costa Mar
description: Spectacular views of the sea and the coves. impossible access to ac. recommended by residents of the area, space for 5 campers. recommended

name: Camping Vinarós

description: Beachfront vacations. Calm, pleasant atmosphere full of surprises. 18 wooden houses, 258 plots (60 to 120m2)

title: (43569) Alcanar - 69 Carrer Barcelona
description: Large parking lot with panoramic sea views. We stayed here for one night. Completely ok for an overnight stop. From 7:30 a.m. the fish factory is in operation: the workers and fish suppliers come ☺️

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 176 Camí de l'Ermita
description: Hermitage with breathtaking views of the coast, very well maintained and quiet area, easy access even for AC 7 meters, wide Tables for picnic Games for children a few meters

title: (12500) Vinaròs -
description: Shaded location for a vehicle, provide chocks because there is a slope. You can also park in the hermitage car park located 100 m before, it is flat but there is no shade. The place is very quiet, very little traffic and above all it is clean !! Great if you have dogs.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 18 Passeig de Jaume I
description: New location for motorhomes on this large car park next to the seaside and the large promenade ATTENTION the one at the edge of the avenue is now prohibited to campers thank you to those who do too much unpacking table chair ect. ... so respect this one !! It is a PARKING not an area where you can unpack Thank you (Michel and Vero)

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 9 Plaça dels Tres Reis
description: Brand new, very clean laundromat. Payment by credit card is not accepted. Only coins are. A banknote/coin exchange device is available. Bins on trolleys available to transport your linen and a table to fold the linen. Opposite, a bar will allow you to wait quietly. Note: the washing of effects relating to animals is not authorized, the same for shoes. No parking in front, but ideally placed for motorhomes because only 4 minutes walk from the motorhome area and the large car park.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 91 Carrer de Sant Francesc
description: New laundromat.

title_short: (12500) Vinaròs - 5 Calle del Cronista Joan Bover

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 7 Avinguda de Pius XII
description: Parking near a laundry. Dog meadow next to it, as well as a playground.

title: (12320) Sant Jorge - CV-11
description: The "Fritz Spaetzle" pitch is open 365 days a year and usually someone is always there or can be reached by phone. The restaurant is closed in June and July and the opening times have changed in August. Mondays are closed.  Electricity; Shower ; Gray water / water supply ; Chemical toilet disposal free of charge; Free WiFi internet access! It is quiet from 11 p.m. to 7 a.m., then the gate is locked. Other opening / closing times by arrangement. The parking space is video-monitored day and night with a direct connection to the police.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 1 Calle Rossell
description: Laundry, 2 machines of 12kg, 1 machine of 16kg, 2 dryers. No socket to recharge laptop computer or other

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 161 Avinguda Francisco Baila Tosca
description: Ideal place to eat, rest and take a bath. There are 3 car parks delimited by some logs.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 1049 N-340a

description:
Pantanet recreational area.
Nice area both to spend the day and to spend the night, with picnic tables under the pine trees, barbecues and a children's area.
There is a small lake that makes the place more beautiful.

title: (43550) Ulldecona - Bassa de les Ermites
description: Hermitage of Pietat Ulldecona. Sports climbing area with free parking. daytime utilities and bar.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 17 Carrer Cala Puntal W
description: Gravel parking lot with bins. Incredible views of the entire coast from Peniscola to Vinaros. Short walk along the possible coast and beach below.

title: (12500) Vinaròs - 2 Avinguda Francisco Baila Tosca
description: Just a public water fountain. No screwable hose adaptor, unfortunately, so bring your bottle with you to refill.

title: (12580) Benicarló - 358 E-15
description: There is a Cepsa petrol station and lots of parking space, area with picnic tables, toilets and sinks.

title: (12580) Benicarló -
description: It’s possible to get here from another side on the highway by orange bridge.

title: (12589) Càlig - 123 Plaça Poligono 15
description:
We have 4 places in the middle of the olive trees with a magnificent view of the countryside and the sea. 
When you are in front of the big green gate, you have arrived, but contact me by email and note in it YOUR PHONE NUMBER, before to organize us. 

I speak French, German, Spanish and some English.

In our peaceful haven you will have the possibility to use the outside toilets and showers, no possibility to use chemical toilets. Internet connection is included near the house and on the terrace.
It is possible to use electricity to 5 euros.

The village of Càlig is 2.7km away, where you will find a supermarket, tobacco shop, public outdoor swimming pool. 

We are 12 km from the beaches of Benicarlo, Vinaroz and PEÑISCOLA. 

Children free up to the age of 12

title: (12580) - 275 Plaça Poligono 1
description: Two parking spaces on the private property of a German artist. Located in a natural blooming garden, which has developed into a bird's paradise. The environment is rural and quiet. You are not strictly tied to the pitch. In the garden there are shady places to stay with seating that invite you to linger. You have the option of using a built-in summer shower, which is located 20 m from your parking space. Since we cannot dispose of the contents of chemical toilets here, you use the toilet in the guest house, which is about 20 m from your parking space. At the moment no electricity connection can be made available, which will change in the future. IT has no WiFi here! I myself use a pre-paid card from a provider that provides an incredible 40 gigas. The nearest village with a supermarket, tobacco and a public outdoor swimming pool is Calig, 3-4 km. From the sea it is 10-12 km to the beaches of Benicarlo, Vinaroz and PEÑISCOLA. Don't miss a visit! In the area, the nature reserve "Sierra de Hirta". There are also numerous possibilities for excursions, hiking in the "Maestrazco", "El Jardín de Peter", in La Puebla de BENIFASSA. And the Ulldecona reservoir! The specified services are included. Service water for showering etc. is not charged. Children free!

title: (43540) La Ràpita - 184 Carrer Sant Isidre
description: Laundromat with fair prices

title: (12580) Benicarló - 250 Partida Río
description: Parking right next to the beach, next to a dead end so little traffic.

title: (43540) La Ràpita -

title: (43540) La Ràpita - 58 Avinguda Constitució

title: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 2 Carrer del Marquès de Valterra
title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 2 Carrer del Marquès de Valterra

title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 5 Paseo Elche

title: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - Camí de Mata-redona
title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - Camí de Mata-redona

title: (12320) Sant Jordi - 1A Avinguda José Soriano Ramos
title_short: (12320) Sant Jordi - 1A Avinguda José Soriano Ramos

title: (43559) Ulldecona -
description:
This place is a hidden secret for nature lovers who don't want to camp illegally . It belongs to Birgitt who owns a large area here and welcomes every kind of camper. She emigrated a long time ago from Germany and is living in her private paradise. She doesn't offer anything except for water. When I arrived, Birgit asked me to share this place here after I told her about Park4Nite because she is not looking for mainstream campers but wants to make this place available.

If you're coming from South on the TV - 3314 , you turn left on cami rural municipal (a bridge) then you turn left instantly after you cross the bridge. After 20 meters you turn right and then follow a dusty and narrow gravel road for roughly 800 meters, until  you reach the first Finca on the right. Contact Birgitt at least one day before and she will be more than happy to welcome you too 
She says that she welcomes motorhomes to but I have my doubts that anything bigger than a Mercedes Viano would make it on the  gravel road ...

name: Camping Alegría del Mar
title: (12580) Camping Alegría del Mar
description: A really super nice mix of camper place, here you really have everything you need. A very friendly English speaking lady at the reception. Beautifully close to the sea about 50 mtr. Electricity, water and drainage are available at every location, so it is nice and comfortable. There is free, excellent WIFI. and partly because they have pruned the trees well, there is good satellite reception. You can also get a larger plot for a small price increase. There is also a cozy bar where you can eat well and cheaply. So top here.

title: (12580) Benicarló - 34 Calle Poligono Rus 22
description: Parking in industrial estate in front of firefighters and gas station opposite

title: (43516) Godall - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place, beautiful views and perfect for spending a few quiet nights.

title: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 0 Carrer Doctor Torné
title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - 0 Carrer Doctor Torné

title_short: (43540) Sant Carles de la Ràpita - Avinguda del Sagrat Cor

title: (12589) Càlig - 46 Carrer de la Parra
description: A water tap next to the road with a playground and just opposite a cooperative that sells organic olive oil for 4 euros per litre. cooperative open from 9 a.m. to 10 a.m. and 12 p.m. to 2 p.m.

the owner is very friendly. 

very quit place to spend te night.

title: (12320) San Jorge - Carretera de Logroño

title: (12580) Benicarló - 23 Avinguda de les Illes Balears
title_short: (12580) Benicarló - 23 Avinguda de les Illes Balears
description: Parking opposite a beach bar. Right next to it is a sewage treatment plant, but it doesn't stink or bother you. Quiet at night, rush hour on the road in the morning. Subsoil Natural soil, slightly sloping. no shadow No problem in October.

title_short: (12580) Benicarló - 2D Calle Lloes de Sant Antoni
description: Huge wasteland in earth and tar nearby a few streets from the city center… 5 mins walk to the square. Unguarded…. We parked there to go to the downtown market on a Wednesday.

name: Camping L'ORANGERAIE
title: (12589) Camping L'ORANGERAIE
description: Càlig, Vía Po Polígono 17. Camping the Orangeraie. Beautiful landscaped and shady campsite. It dates from 2011. Countryside environment among citrus, almond and carob crops. 10 km from the sea Village at 1 km very welcoming. French owner and very nice. Perfect for a prolonged stop.

title: (12320) Maestrat Park Camping

title_short: (12580) Benicarló - 3 Carrer Illes Columbretes de L

title: (12580) Benicarló - 119 Partida Solaes
description: Great place, ample parking, shower on the beach and trash can, there are no other services, great views, very quiet, a place of passage for walkers and athletes. Filled with water, but not emptied.

title: (12330) Traiguera - 12 Avinguda Maestrat
description: Super unpaved parking. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Recommended by the tourist office.

title: (12580) Benicarló - 20 Partida Palmar
description: A good high-pressure car wash with a high-pressure sprayer and various programs including soap. my camper is 2.60 high including spare tire and I easily fit under it. estimated to be 3 meters high. next to a cheap gas station, which has a public toilet that is only open outside siesta times. there is also a large and cheap shopping center

title: (12578) Cervera del Maestre -
description:
Between historically interesting villages in the countryside. Hilly landscape characterized by almond, olive, orange and carob trees.
In the nearest villages (approx. five to ten minutes away by car) there are bakeries, a supermarket, bars and cafés with small culinary offers such as tapas and pizza.
The various beaches of Vinaròs, Benicarló and Peñíscola can be reached in about 20 minutes by car.
3 cats live here. Your pets can be brought along after consultation and compatibility.

I speak German, English, French and Spanish and will bake organic wholemeal rolls for you by arrangement.

See you very soon, Martina

name: Camping La Volta
title: (12598) Camping La Volta
description: An ideal motorhome to stay in, everything is clean and tidy and the pitches are spacious enough. Good satellite reception as you are not disturbed by annoying trees. WIFI is also available and includes the loading and unloading place for water intake, emptying of toilet cassettes, etc. For example, there may be many more RV/camping spots. Friendly welcome at reception.

name: Área Camper La Rotonda de Peñíscola ABIERTO TODO EL AÑO

title_short: (12598) Área Camper La Rotonda de Peñíscola ABIERTO TODO EL AÑO

title: (43540) La Ràpita - Unnamed Road

name: Camping Vizmar
title: (12598) Camping Vizmar
description: Neat camper pitches. plumbing not seen handles we have only used the service. we prefer to be on the beach free of charge and only need a place to discharge our dirty water and empty the toilet every now and then.

description: Small car park to visit this natural park. The park is worth it.

description: Parking by the road, not flat everywhere, at the entrance to Cervera d'El Maestre. No contraindication to stay overnight. Out of season, road not very busy. No services.

title: (12598) Parking Els Daus Peníscola

title: (12340) La Jana - 231 Carrer de la Cort
title_short: (12340) La Jana - 231 Carrer de la Cort

name: Camping bungalow Sol D'Or
title: (12598) Camping bungalow Sol D'Or
description: Camping ground of gold. Summer camping. Uncrowded off-season, so large choice of seats.

name: Camping ciudad del ciclismo
title: (12578) Camping ciudad del ciclismo
description:
Camping City of Cycling,
the only camping in spain with a MTB circuit in its facilities.
plots where you can enjoy the outdoors with your motorhome, caravan, camper or tent in a natural space with ancient olive trees.
located in an area of olive trees that provides you with a lot of shade in summer.
we include the entrance to the municipal swimming pool just 10 minutes away. *until august 31.
free access to MTB circuit and hiking trails.
access to bathrooms and showers with hot water in our facilities.
free access to barbecue and fergadero.
we have a bar/cafeteria.

name: Camping Los Pinos 4*
title: (12598) Camping Los Pinos 4*
description: Camping Los Pinos 4 * very very clean, welcome by the chef who speaks French, sanitary and super clean showers, jacuzzi pool and restaurant on site.

title: (43870) Amposta - 210 Avinguda de la Ràpita
description: Just behind the garage is a large open area with 1 big tree...I stayed underneath all night, nobody said a word....very convenient for fuel, gas , supplies...theres a bit of plant noise from a factory but it's nothing to worry about, great stop if you have a dog.

name: Camping El Cid
title: (12598) Camping El Cid
description: Camping El Cid, 800 m from the sea, about 300 m walking distance to ALDI and 800 m to Mercadona restaurant on site. Sanitary new. Nice location. Paved pitches with small pebbles.

address.street: C/ Azagador de la Cruz, s/n

title: (12350) Canet lo Roig - 21 Calle Fuente
description:
New caravan park in Canet lo Roig. Cozy town, with different routes through ancient olive trees, hiking, mountain biking, parks for children, municipal swimming pool in summer and various services such as shops, bakeries and restaurants.
The parking lot has drinking water and a water changer.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 11 Carrer de les Marjals
description: Large dirt clearing on the right side of a one-way internal road. The sign indicates that vehicles over 5m and 2.5t are not allowed to park (except for buses). Brief stop for a walk up to the castle of Peniscola and its small medieval village, they really deserve. Untested night. No services available. Proximity to soccer and tennis fields.

title: (43570) Santa Bàrbara -
description: Ruine of a mill, adapted to rest.

title: (43870) Amposta - 1 Carrer Sant Cristòfol
description: Parking in Eroski car park, no restrictions. runs right next to the N340 so great stop off. no amenities but you have a small cheap (ish) self service petrol station that also has water. toilets in Eroski supermarket. nice bar in park xiribecs 50m up the road.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 54 Plaça POLIGONO6G
description: Small unpaved car park (land). There is hardly any traffic. Next to the houses. Is free. All of Peñiscola is a blue zone. To get there, there is a narrow but paved road. There is no type of service except garbage containers. 1.2 km from the Castle.

title: (43870) Amposta - 3B Carrer Sebastià Juan Arbó
description: Welcome to the new Amposta motorhome area! This is a recently created area and the emptying/filling of sewage is provisional (the work will be carried out shortly). Located next to the sports area, swimming pool and a large playground, the Ebre delta is the perfect place for you to enjoy your family holidays. With a distance of only 500 meters to the center, 650 meters from a laundry, 500 meters from the municipal swimming pool that has an indoor and outdoor pool. You will have easy access to shops, restaurants and all the amenities that the city has to offer. It has water filling, black / gray and light emptying. Until August 20 there are local festivals with many acts for large and small, the area is close to the concert area and noise can disturb some nights during these days. Enjoy the parties that are all invited.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 11 Vía Po Polígono 7
description: Guarded area for motorhomes from 9:00 to 21:00 with toilet, shower, drinking water, WiFi and discharge area for sewage and grey water. Overnight stay allowed.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 16 Carrer de Pigmalión
description: Area to park at the entrance of the town. For now there is no restriction. 10 minutes walk from the beach. More quiet at night.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 5 Calle Puntarro
description: Parking in open space, quite dirty (human feces and various remains), to spend the day on the beach. Campers can stay overnight. There is a certain unevenness at the end, which decreases in the center. Lots of mosquitoes and lovely birds.

title: (43870) Amposta - 7E Carrer de França
description: Nice tarred parking adjacent to lots of sports facilities and a school. Quiet enough at night. No services but a good overnight stop and easy access to the freeways.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 596 Plaça Poligono 6D
description: Drinking water

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 6 Ronda Fortalesa
description: They have enabled a space to stay overnight for free. An esplanade with capacity for 40-50 .. There are some cans to fill the water tank (not drinkable) free of charge. Good place to spend the night. There is no more service.

title: (43870) Amposta - 20 TV-3405
description: Parking near the rio Ebro and a landscaped trail. possibility to spend the night because no restriction or limit of height or simply like us for a picnic!

title: (12340) La Jana -
description: Small car park for strolling around ancient olive trees.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 31 Plaça Poligono 14E
description: Parking spaces along the street towards the city center. Hadn't seen a sign where RV parking was prohibited true. RV parking in the other direction was expressly forbidden.

name: Camping Ferrer
title: (12598) Camping Ferrer
description:
Peñíscola, 29 Avinguda de l'Estació.
Camping Ferrer in Péniscola. Nice little campsite full of motorhomes and in particular French vehicles that stay there for several months. All the outbuildings are very clean, swimming pool redone. Electrical outlet either Euro or Spanish standard, choice on the terminal block. All pitches have trees. Beware of tall and/or tall people, however I was able to access a pitch with my 8 m and saw other longer, integral motorhomes. There is a WC emptying terminal and a waste water emptying area, several clean water points with pipes in the campsite to fill up the clean water tank. The campsite is 5 mins walk from a beach, restaurants and shops. Possibility to rent bicycles, quads or scooters 200 m from the campsite. The person at the reception speaks perfect French. The town of Péniscola has a medieval castle, Templar in perfect condition which can be visited. The city is very pleasant and lively until late at night, even outside school holidays. Beware of parking in town, everything is in the blue zone, even for motorcycles, from 10 a.m. to 2 a.m. and "local periwinkles" watch until 2 a.m. to ensure that payment for the parking lot is respected. The sandy beaches are cleaned daily and the sea is beautifully clean. There is also a fishing port where you can buy fish directly from the fishermen. The prices of the shops are very interesting. In short, we have been there a lot more and we will come back to it.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 8 Carrer Mestra Bayarri
description: Parking in the residents area (green line), in front of the conference center and next to a hotel. Until 00.00h you pay ota (90cnts per hour). Next to the beach in the bar area where we have breakfast in the morning. We slept well, the cops passed a couple of times and they didn't say anything (we are just a van without camper). WATCH OUT! the next door parking is exclusively for cars.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 28e CV-141
description: Laundry

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 3 Plaça del Jardí
description: Xanascat - Alberg Encanyissada Shower service available for 2.5 euros

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 15 Ronda del Mar
description: Picnic area, with 3 tables and playground. Next to the town of Poblenou with various services. Street parking without height limit or free parking but with height limit. At the beginning of March without space problem, at other times I could not say.

title: () Amposta - Carrer Ebre
description: Flat location, pretty away from everything. Need password for wifi. Okay for a night. Nice walking, see flamingos migration. Near restaurant, bathroom during day. Really busy and heavily used by other campers. Expect 40  campers. !!! Fresh water and dumping only from 9 am to 1 pm !!!

title: (43870) Amposta - 38 Carrer Sant Joan
description: Public parking without any service, but it is allowed to spend the night. Next to the suspension bridge of Amposta, on the banks of the Ebro river. Being so central, it has the problem of noise because cars pass by at night.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 23 Ronda del Mar
description: Football stadium car park. The only place where it is possible to spend the night because prohibition sign in the whole village. Quiet, flat with a bike circuit on site.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 4 Calle Playa
description: Parking next to the port, it is paid, blue zone, there is no sign that prohibits the motorhomes, at the end of October very quiet, it is good to visit the center, which is a 3-minute walk away.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 2 Carrer de Vilanova d'Avinyó
description: Blue zone parking that is paid from 10 in the morning to 12 at night. We arrived around 8:00 p.m., taking advantage of the fact that people were leaving the beach. We have slept without disturbance, with little noise and a pedestrian walk from the beach that has showers.

title: (43549) Poble Nou - 27 Ronda dels Pins
description: Parking next to a park (there are also parked cars), there is also room for motorhomes, without services but we found this place very quiet and perfect for children and dogs with lots of space and surrounded by rice paddies

title: (12598) Peñíscola - Avenida Akra Leuka
description: Paid parking during the day. Nice view of the city, the beach and the castle. feet in the sand

title: (43870) Amposta - TV-3405
description: Small parking along the Ebre where we spent the night without problems in April. no convenience. only mountain bikers and walkers in the early hours. Very calm night.

title: (12598) Peniscola - 18B Urbanizacion Atalayas
description: Nice little spot in a street without a house several places available quiet place with a few walkers clean place overall

title: (43560) La Sénia - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to sleep near the natural reserve without being bothered, beautiful views of the mountains. The last 100 meters are concreted but rather stiff, advised to vans or driver of seasoned motorhome. Only one place has flat 20m after the transition concrete / gravel on the right. Let's leave this place clean, it is apparently not known polluters. A 10min drive from San Pere and the dam are a must see! Good road travelers.

title: (12598) Peniscola - 61 Plaça Poligono 9D
description: Small space next to the road. At night there are no cars and it is very quiet. In summer I doubt that it is the same. Sunrise and spectacular views of Peñiscola

title: (43896) L'Aldea - N-340a
description: Next to the Ap7. Place enabled to have Picnic. Numerous tables and barbecues. It is very spacious and super quiet. We just stopped to eat. We liked it a lot!

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 73 Vía Polígono 9d
description: Flat area by the sea for a small van or camper but only small entrance.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 25 Calle del l'Avenc
description:
Rotonda Zero - The origin of all roundabouts. This is your one time chance to spend a night in the middle of a two lane roundabout. The place further features a truly dystopian end-of-the-world atmosphere and includes two favelas and an authentic Spanish ghost city. It has also a clear view of the sea and practically sees no traffic.

After passing through Peñiscola search for the gravel road that has indications to Cap Blanc which after approx. 500 meters turns into a solid street again. Follow the sign to mirador de las islas and shortly before the ghost city turn right. The road is very steep and the place itself is not level but the unique experience makes up for it.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 25 Urbanización Residencial Edison
description: Flat land, we spent 1 day without being disturbed, on the edge of a small forest road we spent a night without any noise we strongly advise

title: (43580) Deltebre - Carrer Reis Catòlics
description: Parking at the start of the stroll by the river. Quiet, a few mosquitoes. Provide earplugs in windy conditions. Nice view in the morning.

title: (43870) Amposta - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful jetty. Good views at dusk and dawn. Very few vans fit. (3-4).National Park. No overnight possible.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 95 Carretera del Pebret
description: Stunning quiet seaside location, with wonderful views over Peniscola, the path is clean and accessible. Forbidden to stay overnight. Without service.

title: (43514) Mas de Barberans - 10 Travesera 4ª de l'Avinguda Catalunya
title_short: (43514) Mas de Barberans - 10 Travesera 4ª de l'Avinguda Catalunya
description: Quiet and relaxing place near Mas de Barberans where you will find a fountain, tables and 4 parking spaces. There is no electricity or water drainage. There is good shade and it is wonderful. In front is a pond with ducks and geese. Perfect place to rest and visit the area!

name: La Tancada
title: (43870) La Tancada
description: Campsite La Tancada. Swimming pool, showers, toilets and a restaurant (highly appreciated by critics). The campsites are small but doable.

address.street: Carretera de les Salines al Poblenou del Delta

title: (12598) Peníscola - 13 Calle de les Canyes
description: Exceptionally quiet road. Lots of space to park any size Motorhome. No restrictions of any sort. Lovely place to pass a night.

name: Rossell
title: (12511) Rossell
description: Rosell has created a public car park for motorhomes belonging to the province of Castellón, in the Bajo Maestrazgo region. Located on the border with the province of Tarragona. It has a network of services for caravaning. This regulated public parking lot has 4 spaces and water. Among the attractions to highlight are the "Cova de les Bruixes", the "Pena de Bel" a peak of 1,005 meters high and the urban case, of architectural interest, in which the remains of the walls stand out, generically declared Well of Cultural interest. A walk through the center of the village will make us discover the interesting artistic complex of the Church of Sants Joans. If we go to the small town of Bel, we can see its stone houses, whitewashed and with wrought iron balconies, as well as the small Romanesque church of Sant Jaume.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - Carretera Pebret
description:
Fantastic place, a bit up the road is a big area to park your camper/ van near a sheltered cove. Which is a small naturist/nudist beach. Fantastic sunrise and moonrise. One of the best spots since Cabo Gato! Nice walking route along the coast. 

PROHIBITED camping

title: (43870) Amposta -
description: Cool place for a picnic

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 21 Avenida Ermita San Antonio
description:
Old Church/monastery.

Awesome view over the coast and surrounding landscape.

Access isn't for the faint hearted.

Initial section loose, washed out gravel, then STEEP concreted road, then loose, but not washed out gravel.

Picnic tables and bbq area at the top.

4x4 or a gung-ho attitude. Worth it, though.

title: (12598) Peñíscola - 29 Vía Po Polígono 8
description: Good place, very bad road

name: Molí l'Abad
title: (12599) Molí l'Abad
description: Molí l'Abad Camping, restaurantes and hotel.

title: () Sant Carles de la Ràpita - Unnamed Road
title_short: () Sant Carles de la Ràpita - Unnamed Road
description: Sand dunes and mini dunes very refreshing because swept by the wind ideal for nautical activity. Night not possible but the gendarmerie passes and distributes plans with the areas and camping near this place. The fine can reach up to 6000 euros.

title: (43870) Amposta - 5 Partida Carlet
description: Private family camper farm that offers their space to share their way of life, site for two motorhomes, with a play area for children, animals (chickens, dogs, kittens) and an eco-garden, picnic area. It has a small cabin where there is a shower (not hot water) and a bathroom. There is hot water in the outdoor shower. Ideal for families with children. Possibility of buying organic seasonal vegetables and organic eggs if available. They also offer the possibility of washing clothes

title: (43548) Tarragona - Sendero de Playa
description: Very nice spot, paying from July 1st, ban on spending the night, CC parking authorized during the day, free the rest of the year, CC area with services not too far

title: (43870) L'Eucaliptus -
description:
Large space for motorhomes and vans. possibility of kite, beach bar for a drink and see a beautiful sunset.

Camping and campers forbidden 21-09.

title: (12598) Peníscola - 9013 Plaça Poligono 8
description: Land parking in some of the nearby coves. Outside the PN of the Sierra de Irta. E Very quiet by the sea, ideal for cycling routes, hiking, diving ... No services nearby.

title: (43870) Amposta - Carretera de les Salines al Poblenou del Delta
title_short: (43870) Amposta - Carretera de les Salines al Poblenou del Delta
description: Day parking only

address.street: Carretera de les Salines al Poblenou del Delta

title: (43896) L'Aldea - Partida la Ermita
description: Big parking lot between cemetery, watchtower and church. Shaded, a drinkable water tap, a small area for kids, a good spot to spend nights...

title: (43540) Tarragona - Sendero de Playa
description: Trabucador Beach Parking. Only from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m. Price of AC (-booking online- or you pay when you arrive. Very spacious. Right on the beach.

title: (12597) Santa Magdalena de Pulpis - 1032 N-340
description: Cepsa gas station: water refill, supermarket, and space in the shade to stop for a while. It does not have a service to drain gray water.

title: (12170) Sant Mateu - Unnamed Road
description: For lovers of tranquility and walks.  Place on a parking Ermitage making restaurant super view. Water tap. Olive oil lovers go to Sant Mateu towards old bell tower tasting manufacturer.

title: (12170) Sant Mateu -
description:
Small parking space parallel to the road with little traffic. Monastery with restaurant a few meters further. There is also drinking water there.
Great view in all directions.
A little quieter than the parking space next door.

name: Parking Ermita Nuestra Señora de los Ángeles
title: (12170) Parking Ermita Nuestra Señora de los Ángeles
title_short: (12170) Parking Ermita Nuestra Señora de los Ángeles
description: A great location! 5 campers can stand next to each other. No camping behavior. Beautiful courtyard. Illuminated and very quiet after 5 pm. Playground for children. Walking route to Cervera del Maestre, Sant Mateu, Canet lo Roig and Sant Jordi. Forests with a wide view. Place has good 4G connection and plenty of sun. Little owls at dusk.

address.street: Camí de la Mare de Déu

title: (43548) L'Eucaliptus - Unnamed Road
description: Possibility to park for free by the sea with a magnificent view of the delta. Same view as on paying car park and just as beautiful sea

title: (12597) Santa Magdalena de Polpís - 79 Avinguda de Doctor Luis Torres Morera
title_short: (12597) Santa Magdalena de Polpís - 79 Avinguda de Doctor Luis Torres Morera
description: Possibility of camping in the sports center. Ask at City Hall.

address.street: 79 Avinguda de Doctor Luis Torres Morera

title: (12598) Peniscola -
description: Beautiful place 1km from the badum tower. beautiful coves not far away. dirt road to get there but feasible with small vehicles.

title: (43877) Balada - 20 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
description: Drinking water tap in the playground

title: (43580) Deltebre -
description: Isolated car park. in the middle of nothing. authorized and quiet

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 53 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 53 Carrer de Sant Cristòfol
description: Super quiet site next to the Ebro river. No services. Greenway parking. Small parking spots, 6m max.

title: (12599) Pobla de Benifassà - 7 CV-105
description: Picnic area equipped with tables, next to the dam. Very calm.

title: (12597) Santa Magdalena de Polpís - Camí de Salzadella
title_short: (12597) Santa Magdalena de Polpís - Camí de Salzadella
description: Picnic area with barbecue and water fountain in a hermitage, accessible with any vehicle, totally recommended

title: (43896) L'Aldea - 5 Raval de Leche
description: The area has 35 parking spaces, water supply, gray and black water drainage, lighting and is located on the same side of Parque de la Vía, behind the Tourist Information Office, next to the city center and close to shops. the network of bike paths and greenways with direct access to the Camino de la Ermita, one of the access routes to the Delta. The City Council has newly created some SP 150 m from the current area.   No toilets

title: (12170) Sant Mateu - 4 Avinguda Racó de la Marquesa
title_short: (12170) Sant Mateu - 4 Avinguda Racó de la Marquesa
description:
Parking on a vacant lot in residential area next to a school. 2 minutes walk from the Plaza Mayor. On this place selling olive oil including an olive oil millennia.
We must be able to spend the night on this car park. Framework not great but it helps.

title: (43870) Amposta - Unnamed Road
description: Parking allowed only during the day.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 18 Carrer Reis Catòlics
description: Picnic area with shade and a fountain.

title: (43580) Deltebre - Carrer Amposta
description: Rest area with parking, information stand

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 48 Avinguda de Mallorca
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 48 Avinguda de Mallorca
description: Parking at the entrance of the town. Without services You can spend the night.

title: (12170) Sant Mateu - 23 Plaça de les Monges
title_short: (12170) Sant Mateu - 23 Plaça de les Monges
description:
LaColada, Sant Mateu is a space to wash and dry your clothes quickly and cheaply. Washing prices start at 5 euros and drying prices start at 2 euros. TV serv
ice, easy parking, bars and restaurants in the same area, as well as a public toilet just 100m from the place. There is a machine to convert notes to coins.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 28 Passeig de la Segregació
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 28 Passeig de la Segregació
description: A large parking lot exclusively for motorhomes. No demarcated places. Sandy surface. Because gray and black water can also be discharged and fresh water can be tapped, this looks more like a free aire. The service area is not to the left past the entrance, where there is a sign that you need a ticket. The care is at the back right and free. No card or token needed. There is room for at least 30 campers. The police regularly drive around the site, it seems standard control round. They look around and drive on. Tables and chairs are tolerated.

title: (12170) Sant Mateu - 24h Avinguda de la Constitució
title_short: (12170) Sant Mateu - 24h Avinguda de la Constitució
description: Free drinking water service and toilets not enough to empty gray water

title: (43520) - El Mas de Barró
description: Recreation in the middle of the mountain region. The way there is about 6km long. Tarred at the beginning, the rest is gravel. Four-wheel drive is not absolutely necessary.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - carrer Major 118
description: Self-service washing and drying clothes.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 3 Plaça 23 de Juny
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 3 Plaça 23 de Juny
description: Drinking water source

title: (12360) Xert - 96 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Caravan parking with emptying of gray and black water, in addition to being able to refill water. Next to the municipal swimming pools (open in the summer season) and the municipal sports center.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 12 Carrer Aube
description: We slept peacefully on the banks of the Ebro, playground, slalom skate track, neighborhood picnic with barbecue, waste source container and drinking water. Forbidden at night.

title: (43580) Deltebre -
description: On the banks of the Elbre on the right bank with a magnificent view of the bridge (lit at night). A walking path above for joggers and bicycles. A few passages of fishermen, very quiet night, but like everywhere in this region mosquitoes and garbage cans!!!!

name: Área Camper Els Muntells
title: (43879) Área Camper Els Muntells
description: Municipal area in Els Muntells just behind the bullring. Services are now disabled.

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 31 Partida Mas Roig
title_short: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 31 Partida Mas Roig
description: Asphalted pier next to the ebro river

title: (43877) Sant Jaume d'Enveja - 4 Partida Ribes
description: Public parking by the river, il.luminat i asfaltat. At the edge of a road suitable for walking along the river. Very calm.

title: (43580) Deltebre - 36 Carrer Verge del Carme
description: Nice motorhome area on the river and on the Deltebre side. Supply and disposal (toilet, fresh and gray water) 100 meters in front of the square with its own barrier and machines.

title: (43896) La Aldea - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Water point with flexible hose attached to a tire inflation terminal! Unlimited water ... enjoy

title: (12599) Fredes - Unnamed Road
description: Super place maybe not in the high season, four-wheel drive is an advantage and not absolutely necessary. Great. Hiking area, drinking water from the stream
